text: My name is
Takatoshi Okagawa, SVP of NTT DOCOMO
and I'm in charge of the NTT DOCOMO R&D
division.
AWS is one of

the most important strategic partners
for NTT DOCOMO.

Our collaboration is most symbolized
by the recent 5G core
network on AWS, and also vRAN projects.

As DOCOMO plans the nationwide
deployment of vRAN starting
in 2025, as a key component of vRAN,

we have selected EKS Anywhere
provided by AWS

as the virtualization platform,
together with NEC vRAN software,

Qualcomm Hardware Accelerator
and also HPE Hardware platform.

With this vRAN architecture,
we will be able to deploy new features

with flexibility and a shorter
time to market and also leverage COTS hardware

And hardware accelerator,
which are becoming more powerful

and more  energy efficient for the broader
market outside telecommunications.
In addition, with EKS functions, you know,

we can automate network management
and operation,

reducing opex and increasing
network service availability.

And we also expect the potential
of the AWS ecosystem for the value creation.
The benefits of its

many service applications
running on EKS, and the engineers

familiar with EKS tools
and environments. For example,

so we can leverage that ecosystem
to add value to our network

by learning application
like edge AI on vRAN platform,
sharing the same computing resources.

So finally, we,
looking forward to further exciting

collaboration and good outcome
between AWS and NTT DOCOMO.
